Package <Unnamed>

Class Summary
AbsenceDate Creates an object that holds the date of the absence along with the the reason for the absence.
AddEmployeeCard Creates a card where the user can create a new employee and add it to teh database.
Calendar  
CalendarMonth Creates a month of year that contains absences organized by date.
CalendarYear Creates a calendar for the whole year, with months each filled with absence dates and the people with absences and the reasons for the absence.
CreationPanel Creates a panel to be placed on the Add Employee Card for the AttendanceManager.
EditInfoCard Creates a card where the User can edit the info of any already existing employee.
EmployeeDatabase Creates a database of the employees, their absences, and the reasons for their absences.
EmployeeDisplayPanel A display panel that graphically displays all the information of a give employee.
EmployeeEditCard Creates a card where the user can add an absence to an already existing employee.
EmployeeEditPanel Creates a panel that allows the user to add an absence to an already existing employee.
IntroWindow This class is the graphical representation of the intro window and also deals with the actionListener
PeopleCard This class represents the people not attending a specific day
Person Creates a class of Person, with the age, job, vacation days, and absences.
PersonalizedCalendarDate Creates a calendardate that contains the name of the person, their absence date, and the reason for their absence.
TesterMain  
UserOptionWindow This class creates the main window for an AttendenceManager that displays information of the month of May in 2014.
